info.name: AMO - Always display "Version Information"
info.description: By default AMO hides "Version Information" section that typically contains latest Release Notes. This style reverses that behavior.
info.additionalInfo: Since I find the "Version Information" section useful I changed the relevant "display" CSS rule on AMO. This style has been inspired by addons.mozilla.org/de/firefox/ and it fixes a layout issue due to that style. NOTE - This style also hides the show/hide button for "Version Information" section.
